scripts.postinstall: CWD=$PWD find raspberry-pi/ scp/ -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 2 -iname package.json -execdir npm install \;
scripts.build-all: CWD=$PWD find raspberry-pi/ scp/ -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 2 -iname package.json -execdir npm run build \;
scripts.prestart: CWD=$PWD find raspberry-pi/ scp/ -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 2 -iname dist -type d -execdir bash -c 'cp -rp ./dist $CWD/dist/$(basename $(readlink -f .))' \;
